greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A005811(n) + 4.
comment: The composer Per Nørgård's name is also written in the OEIS as Per Noergaard.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
Jeffrey Shallit, The mathematics of Per Noergaard's rhythmic infinity system, Fib. Q., 43 (2005), 262-268.
mathematica: Table[Length@ Split@ IntegerDigits[n, 2] - Boole[n == 0] + 4, {n, 0, 93}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Sep 05 2017 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 16 2008
